risk_analysis.title: Customer Self-Service Order Portal

CRITICAL.detail: Current license pool is 500, which may be insufficient for full implementation
CRITICAL.action_required: Verify license capacity and potentially purchase additional licenses before project start
evidence: Current license pool: 500 login-based licenses
Risk flag for LICENSE_CAPACITY with HIGH severity

HIGH.description: Performance Challenges with Large Data Sets
HIGH.detail: Previous similar projects experienced performance issues with >1000 records per user
HIGH.action_required: Implement robust pagination and caching strategy
evidence: Performance risk flag with MEDIUM severity
Previous project learning: 'Performance issues with > 1000 records per user'

MEDIUM.detail: Historical similar project had significant estimation overrun
MEDIUM.action_required: Conduct detailed technical spike and refine estimation
evidence: Previous project estimated 13 points, actually 21 points
Some technical unknowns around API and license limitations

MEDIUM.detail: Some stakeholder requirement confirmations are still pending
MEDIUM.action_required: Complete stakeholder interviews and requirement validation
evidence: Refinement completeness score of 75
Some stakeholder requirement confirmations are still pending

conflicts.detail: Potential conflict with other ongoing portal implementations
conflicts.resolution: Consolidate license usage and prioritize projects

risk_analysis.split_suggestion: Consider splitting into phases: 1) Basic order tracking, 2) Advanced features like cancellation, 3) Full permission and security implementation

MEDIUM.description: Incomplete technical requirements and implementation details
MEDIUM.detail: PBI lacks specific technical implementation approach and performance considerations
MEDIUM.action_required: Conduct detailed technical design workshop with UX and engineering teams
evidence: hasAllRequirements score is only 70%
No specific performance or technical implementation details provided

MEDIUM.description: Potential performance challenges with order status label changes
MEDIUM.detail: Previous similar implementations had performance challenges with status workflows
MEDIUM.action_required: Conduct performance testing and create optimization strategy
evidence: PERFORMANCE_RISK flag in context enrichment
Similar PBI-2024-112 noted performance and error handling challenges

LOW.description: Potential mismatch between discussed and actual order statuses
LOW.detail: Technical documentation suggests more statuses exist than discussed
LOW.action_required: Validate complete list of order statuses with product team
evidence: CONF-Status-Picklist note: 'More statuses exist than discussed in meeting!'
Incomplete refinement score of 65%

conflicts.description: Potential overlap with recent order status workflow projects
conflicts.detail: Similar recent PBIs dealt with order status and workflow automation
conflicts.resolution: Review learnings from PBI-2024-112 and PBI-2023-234

risk_analysis.title: B2B Account Permission Model

CRITICAL.detail: Potential bottleneck with Experience Cloud licenses
CRITICAL.action_required: Verify current license availability and budget for additional licenses
evidence: Previous project required additional Experience Cloud licenses mid-project
External User licenses may be needed

HIGH.detail: Lacks specific authentication mechanism and detailed security implementation
HIGH.action_required: Conduct a detailed technical design workshop to define authentication and permission model specifics
evidence: Lacks explicit authentication mechanism specified
Integration details with Salesforce are high-level
Role-based permission logic needs more detailed definition

HIGH.description: GDPR Compliance and Permission Model Complexity
HIGH.detail: Implementing account-based visibility with complex permission rules
HIGH.action_required: Create comprehensive RBAC matrix and conduct legal review
evidence: GDPR compliance requirement exists
Need for account-based visibility instead of user-based access
Requires audit trail for all data access

MEDIUM.detail: Historical similar projects had significant estimation challenges
MEDIUM.action_required: Conduct detailed estimation workshop with lessons learned from similar projects
evidence: Initial estimate 13 points, actual 21 points in similar project
Complexity of GDPR compliance not fully explored
Salesforce integration adds additional complexity

conflicts.description: Overlap with Previous B2B Permission Projects
conflicts.detail: Similar projects revealed unexpected complexities in permission models
conflicts.resolution: Review and incorporate learnings from previous implementations

conflicts.detail: Legal review and technical implementation may strain team capacity
conflicts.resolution: Allocate dedicated resources and plan for potential timeline extension

risk_analysis.split_suggestion: Break into smaller stories: 1) Permission Model Design, 2) Salesforce Integration, 3) GDPR Compliance Implementation, 4) Audit Trail Development
